task.title: Strict hard cut: remove daemon fallbacks/aliases and enforce broker-only warnings

events.content: Removed daemon compatibility layer entirely across CLI/dashboard; broker endpoints and fields are now required: Removed daemon compatibility layer entirely across CLI/dashboard; broker endpoints and fields are now required

raw.question: Removed daemon compatibility layer entirely across CLI/dashboard; broker endpoints and fields are now required
raw.chosen: Removed daemon compatibility layer entirely across CLI/dashboard; broker endpoints and fields are now required
raw.reasoning: Prevent silent mixed-mode failures and force explicit migration to broker-only APIs

retrospective.summary: Removed daemon fallbacks/aliases, enforced broker-only APIs, and added loud breaking warnings in CLI/dashboard
